Html:
Is it possible that you could add "item-type" to Additional Requirements in the optimizer?

Reason I ask is that I have a resto druid. Lots of cloth items are good upgrades to him, but when I raid with my guild druids are given lower priority than clothies for cloth drops (for good reasons).

Therefore I want to add a requirement when I optimize to only look for leather upgrades.
I believe if you go to Tools->Select item types, that should allow you to filter only on leather items.
Correct, it's called Tools > Refine Types of Items Listed...
